arts.ttl: Man City sign midfielder Gonzalez from Porto
arts.sum: Manchester City have signed Spanish midfielder Nico Gonzalez from Porto on a four-and-a-half year contract. The 23-year-old becomes City’s fourth arrival of the January transfer window following an impressive start to the season in Portugal, scoring seven goals and providing six assists across 29 appearances in all competitions.

arts.ttl: Porto drop points again in 2-2 draw at Rio Ave
arts.sum: Martín Anselmi’s first Primeira Liga match as FC Porto coach ended in a 2-2 draw at Rio Ave. Twice the home team took the lead as crass mistakes from Porto centre-backs Nehuén Pérez and Otávio were taken advantage of by smart finishes from Clayton Silva and Ole Pohlmann respectively. But twice Porto fought back, curiously with the two “villains” redeeming themselves as Pérez scored from a corner and Otávio’s fierce 25-yard shot was deflected past the impressive Rio Ave goalkeeper Cezary Miszta on its way into the net. Both teams could have scored further goals in an entertaining match, Porto youngster Rodrigo Mora in particular showing his magical skillset again. It is now four Liga games without a win for the Dragons, who find themselves lagging a distant eight points behind leaders Sporting ahead of hosting the Portuguese champions on Friday night. Rio Ave 2-2 FC Porto highlights Video highlights to follow shortly

arts.ttl: Manchester City sign Porto midfielder Nico Gonzalez for £50m
arts.sum: The Spain Under-21 international has agreed a deal until 2029.

arts.ttl: Man City CONFIRM £50.2m signing of Porto midfielder Nico Gonzalez as struggling champions take January spending to £180m
arts.sum: Gonzalez, 23, underwent his medical in Portugal ahead of signing a five and a half year contract. Barcelona also received a 40 per cent sell-on as part of the deal.

arts.ttl: Man City finally sign Rodri replacement with £49m splurge on Porto star
arts.sum: Defensive midfielder Nico Gonzalez has made the £49m switch to boost Pep Guardiola’s side

arts.ttl: Man City sign Porto midfielder Gonzalez for £50m
arts.sum: Manchester City complete the signing of Porto midfielder Nico Gonzalez for 60m euros (£50m).

arts.ttl: Official | Torino sign Reims’ Amine Salama on loan
arts.sum: Torino FC have signed Reims striker Amine Salama (24) on loan, the Serie A side have announced. L’Equipe understands that Salama’s purchase option is valued at €4m. In January 2024,…

arts.ttl: Amine Salama to join Torino on loan for the rest of the season
arts.sum: In what’s been an active deadline transfer day for Stade de Reims, another one of their players is on the move. L’Équipe reports that Amine Salama (24) is the latest…

arts.ttl: Porto eyeing last-minute swoop for Barcelona youngster
arts.sum: A member of the midfield ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona has emerged as a late-transfer window target on the part of Porto. That’s according to Fabrizio Romano, who points…

arts.ttl: Hertha snub AC Milan and Porto to keep Algerian starlet
arts.sum: Ibrahim Maza will finish the season in 2. Bundesliga after Hertha Berlin declined offers from AC Milan and Porto.
